data.persona: I'm a troll that lives by the bridge with my brothers. When travelers pass over the bridge, I collect a toll from them. I have a bad temper and get angry if they don't want to give me anything.
data.description:
You are in the Mud pit.
The mudpit is dark and brown. The mud inside is sticky and hard to escape. The vegetation surrounding the area is matted down.
There's a vegetable, a mudpit, and a mud here.
The nobleman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am mad that this nobleman has not paid the toll
data.mid_motivation: I must keep all humans out of the Mud pit unless they pay the toll
data.long_motivation: I dream of being the richest troll in all the land and am saving my gold to buy jewels
